string.name: name
string.value: Empress's Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: For every 5 levels on your highest level Cygnus Knight or Mihile character, this skill will gain 1 Skill Point. Blessing of the Fairy and Empress's Blessing do not stack, so only the stronger skill will be active.\r\nThis skill can reach a max of Level 30, based on your Cygnus Knight or Mihile character's Noble Mind skill.

string.value: [Potential Skill] Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. #cSkills that have already reached master level are not increased.# \nExceptions: Beginner skills and Combat Orders cannot be increased.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 64, All skill levels increased by 1 level for 240 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Advanced Blessing

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nGreatly increases your ATT, Magic ATT, DEF, Accuracy, Avoidability, Max HP, and Max MP. Reduces the amount of MP used when using skills. Can be stacked with other buff skills except for Advanced Blessing.

string.name: h1
string.value: MP Cost: 120. For 240 seconds - Weapon ATT: +20, Magic ATT: +20, Weapon DEF +425, Magic DEF +425, Accuracy +260, Avoidability +260, Max HP +475, Max MP +475, MP Consumption: -12%

string.name: name
string.value: Decent Speed Infusion

string.name: desc
string.value: [Potential Skill]\nConsumes HP and MP to increase your attack speed 1 level for a fixed period of time. It can be stacked with other buffs except Speed Infusion.

string.name: h1
string.value: HP Cost: 120, MP Cost: 120, Attack Speed increased for 240 seconds.

string.name: name
string.value: Unicorn Spike

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons a sacred unicorn that attacks multiple enemies ahead of you while weakening them for a fixed period of time. Weakened enemies take additional damage from a fixed number of attacks from your party members. For boss monsters, the amount of additional damage is doubled.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Critical Attacks: #attackCount, Additional Damage Debuff Chance: #prop%, Additional Damage Debuff Duration: #time sec, Amount of Additional Damage: #y\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Summons a sacred unicorn that attacks multiple enemies ahead of you while weakening them for a fixed period of time. Weakened enemies take additional damage from a fixed number of attacks from your party members. For boss monsters, the amount of additional damage is doubled.

string.name: name
string.value: Gust Dive

string.value: Uses the power of wind to dive down onto multiple enemies, dealing damage to all of them. Requires 120 or more Jump.

string.name: name
string.value: Water Shield

string.name: desc
string.value: Borrows the power of the spirits to raise a water barrier around you for a fixed period of time. The barrier absorbs a portion of the damage you receive, and increases resistance against abnormal status and all elemental attacks.

string.name: name
string.value: Elemental Knights

string.name: desc
string.value:
Randomly summons an Ice Spirit, Fire Spirit, or Shadow Spirit to aid you in battle.
Ice Spirit: Has a chance to freeze enemies.
Fire Spirit: Deals continuous fire damage to enemies.
Shadow Spirit: Deals increased damage.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, 1 random Spirit summoned for #time sec.
Ice Spirit - Damage: #damage%, Freeze Chance: #prop%, Freeze Duration: #subTime sec
Fire Spirit - Damage Over Time: #v% chance of causing #y% damage every #x sec for #w sec
Shadow Spirit: Damage: #z%
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.value: Your cold, uncaring heart steels you against attacks, providing a temporary increases to DEF, Abnormal Status Resistance, and all Elemental Resistance.

string.name: name
string.value: Carrion Breath

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the power of the Poison Demon's horrible breath to attack multiple enemies at once. Targets receive continual damage over a short amount of time and are unable to eat lunch for a week afterwards.

string.value: Barricade Mastery

string.name: name
string.value: Infernal Concussion

string.name: name
string.value: Demon Impact

string.name: desc
string.value: Call forth your inner demon to deal critical damage on multiple enemies in front of you. Your channel to the nether gives you a chance to ignore Enemy DEF and raises your chance for a critical. Final damage increases when fighting boss monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Leech Aura

string.name: desc
string.value: Utilize your connection with the crawling slimy things of the world to sap enemy HP with every blow. You and your party members will receive life for every blow you inflict for a short time, up to 3% at a time.

string.value: Acceleration Bot EX-7

string.name: desc
string.value: You summon bot EX-7 to increase the Movement Speed of all monsters on the map but decrease their DEF. EX-7 will self-destruct when it runs out of power.

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Healing Robot H-LX

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons the stationary bot H-LX to heal nearby party members with its special built-in detection sensor. Once healed, party member cannot receive another heal for 5 seconds. The H-LX self-destructs when it runs out of power.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Robot SG-88

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons giant robot SG-88 to attack all nearby enemies. An activation gauge pops up when this robot is summoned, and damage can be charged and amplified (up to two times the base amount) by hitting the regular attack key.

string.name: name
string.value: Mech: Missile Tank

string.name: desc
string.value:
Activates <Missile Tank> mode during which your meach continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Seige Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Tank Mode MP Cost: #mpCon plus #u MP every #v sec, Damage: #damage% \nBasic Attack Critical Rate: +#cr%, MP Cost: #w, Damage Bonus (Siege mode): +#z%

string.name: pdesc
string.value:
Activates Missile Tank mode during which your mech continuously consumes MP to gain an increased Critical Hit Rate. You can use Siege Mode during Missile Tank mode for increased damage. 
Get on/off your mount by pressing the skill key. 
[To shoot: [#cAttack key#]
[Skills that can be used: #cLaser Blast, Siege Mode#]
Required Skill: #cMech: Siege Mode Lv. 10#

string.name: ph
string.value: Tank Mode MP Cost: #mpCon plus #u MP every #v sec, Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount \nBasic Attack Critical Rate: +#cr%, MP Cost: #w, Damage Bonus (Siege mode): +#z%

string.name: name
string.value: Satellite Safety

string.name: desc
string.value: Permanently increases Satellite attack damage. When you take a fatal blow, a Satellite can minimize the damage you take by absorbing some of the damage. The Satellite will then disappear and the skill will be on cooldown. \nToggle this skill #cOn/Off# by pressing the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cSatellite Lv. 10#

string.name: h
string.value: Satellite Attack Damage: +#damR% \nProcs when you take damage more than #x% of your Max HP, Absorbs #y% of the damage received, Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: When you take a fatal blow, a Satellite can minimize the damage you take by absorbing some of the damage. The Satellite will then disappear and the skill will be on cooldown. \nToggle this skill #cOn/Off# by pressing the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cSatellite Lv. 10#

string.name: ph
string.value: Absorbs #y% of damage greater than #x% of your MaxHP\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec#

string.value: Active Effects - MP Cost: #mpCon, While moving - Damage: #damage%, Max Enemies Hit: #mobCount, Number of Attacks: #attackCount, After moving - Attacks #w times with #v% damage\nPassive Effects - Increases Mille Cartes's damage by #damR%

string.name: name
string.value: Carte Noire

string.name: desc
string.value: Each critical attack has a chance to produce a card that attacks nearby enemy automatically. #cThis card is added to your deck.#\nAlso permanently increases Avoidability chance.

string.name: h
string.value: Upon a successful critical attack, card appears at #prop% chance, Damage: #damage%, #cDeck +1#\nAdditional Avoidability Chance +#subProp%

string.value: Each critical attack has a chance to produce a card that attacks nearby enemy automatically. #cThis card is added to your deck.#\nAlso permanently increases Avoidability chance.

string.value: Priere D'Aria

string.value: Powerful memories of Aria significantly increase Attack and allow you to ignore some enemy DEF.

string.value: Powerful memories of Aria significantly increase Attack and allow you to ignore some enemy DEF.

string.name: name
string.value: Vol D'Ame

string.name: desc
string.value: Steals buffs from nearby monsters. If you steal more than one buff, the most powerful will be applied. This skill only works of monsters have been buffed.

string.name: h
string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #mobCount, Buffs applied:
#cAttack#: Attack +#epad
#cDamage Ignored#: Damage Received -#x%
#cDamage Reflect#: Reflects #y% of Damage Received
#cInvincibility#: Temporary Invincibility
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

string.name: pdesc
string.value: Removes all positive status effects from nearby enemies.

string.name: ph
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies: #mobCount

string.name: desc
string.value: Temporarily increases the Mesos dropped by monsters. Meso drops increase in proportion to skill level.\nThis skill can be toggled on and off with the skill key.\nRequired Skill: #cMeso Explosion Lv. 3#

string.name: h
string.value: Meso Drop Chance: #prop%

string.name: name
string.value: Judgment Draw

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.name: h
string.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks with Carte Blanche #u times. Grants one of the following effects:\n#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%\n#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%

string.value: Judgment Draw

string.name: desc
string.value: Uses up your entire stack of cards to pull out one card and grant additional effects to that card's attack. Can only been used when your deck is full.

string.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks enemies with Carte Noire #u times. Also grants one of the following effects for #time sec.
#cDestin Card:# Critical Rate +#v%
#cMalheur Card:# Item Drop Rate +#w%
#cEndurance Card:# Abnormal Status Resistance +#x%, Elemental Resistance +#y%
#cTuteur Card:# DEF +#s%
#cDrain Card:# #z% of the damage dealt is absorbed as HP
